content: *from the pages of family circle easy knitting comes this easy cardigan alternating row of single and double_crochet combined with simple shaping will make this cover-up a favorite addition to your wardrobe in luscious lavender * easy sized for x-small small medium large 6 6 6 7 skeins in lilac size h/8 5mm crochet hook five 5/8 /15mm buttons finished measurements bust 34½ 37 38 40½ &#34 /87 5 94 96 5 102 5 cm waist 32 34½ 36 38 &#34 /81 87 5 91 5 96 5 cm length 19¼ 19¼ 21 21 &#34 /49 49 54 54 cm upper arm 13½ 14 14¾ 15½ &#34 /34 35 5 37 38 5 cm gauge 13 sts and 11 row to 4 /10cm over pat st using size h/8 5mm hook
